title: High Gas Bill Inquiry
description: A customer calls because their gas bill doubled in the winter and they want to understand why.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's gas usage history and compare it with the heating degree days (HDD) for the billing period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that usage increased, and it correlates with a much colder than average month.

tasks.description: Explain the relationship between colder weather and higher heating usage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates why the bill was higher.

tasks.description: Offer the customer information on energy conservation tips and the budget billing program to help manage seasonal bill swings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides helpful information on savings and bill management programs.
